neuron

Class NeuronFixedConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • base.ComponentConfiguration
      • neuron.NeuronFixedConfig

  • public class NeuronFixedConfig
extends ComponentConfiguration
    A neuron that produces pre-determined spike patterns.
    Author:
    Oliver J. Coleman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NeuronFixedConfig()
      Create a NeuronFixedConfig.
      NeuronFixedConfig(double spikePatternPeriod, double[] spikeTimings)
      Create a NeuronFixedConfig with a custom firing pattern.
      NeuronFixedConfig(double spikePatternPeriod, double spikingPeriod, double startDelay)
      Create a NeuronFixedConfig with a regular firing pattern.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NeuronFixedConfig

        public NeuronFixedConfig()
        Create a NeuronFixedConfig. This is only used for retrieving a configuration singleton.

      • NeuronFixedConfig

        public NeuronFixedConfig(double spikePatternPeriod,
                 double[] spikeTimings)
        Create a NeuronFixedConfig with a custom firing pattern.
        Parameters:
        spikePatternPeriod - The total length of the pattern (s).
        spikeTimings - An array containing the times (s) of each spike, relative to the beginning of the pattern.

      • NeuronFixedConfig

        public NeuronFixedConfig(double spikePatternPeriod,
                 double spikingPeriod,
                 double startDelay)
        Create a NeuronFixedConfig with a regular firing pattern.
        Parameters:
        spikePatternPeriod - The total length of the pattern (s).
        spikingPeriod - The time between spikes (s).
        startDelay - Time before spiking begins (s).

    • Method Detail

      • setSpikeTimings

        public void setSpikeTimings(double[] spikeTimings)
        Sets a new firing pattern. The Neuron is reset and will begin at the start of the new pattern.
        Parameters:
        spikeTimings - An array containing the times (ms) of each spike, relative to the beginning of the pattern.
